mapper.insert: insert into game_suit_info (suitid, suitname, profession, unlocklevel, summary) values (#{suitid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suitname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unlocklevel, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into game_suit_info (suitid, suitname, profession, unlocklevel, summary) values (#{item.suitid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.suitname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unlocklevel, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from game_suit_info where 1=1 and suitid = #{0}
mapper.update:
update game_suit_info
suitname = #{suitname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unlocklevel = #{unlocklevel, jdbcType=INTEGER},
summary = #{summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and suitid = #{suitid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
